    van Genuchten Water Retention Curve

    get_vg_hydraulic_head.Rd

    van Genuchten Water Retention Curve

    Usage

    get_vg_hydraulic_head(theta, theta_r, theta_s, alpha, gamma_s)

    Arguments

    theta

    volumetric water content

    theta_r

    residual water content

    theta_s

    saturated water content

    alpha

    scaling parameter (reciprocal of air entry pressure, units of 1/length)

    gamma_s

    curve shape, dimensionless

    Details

    See: Pan, T., Hou, S., Liu, Y., & Tan, Q. (2019). Comparison of three models fitting the soil water retention curves in a degraded alpine meadow region. Scientific Reports, 9(1), 18407.

    Examples

    # example code
library(units)
theta <- 0.24
theta_r <- 0.15
theta_s <- 0.25
alpha <- set_units(0.008, "1/cm") # should have units of 1/length
gamma_s <- 10.4
get_vg_hydraulic_head(theta, theta_r, theta_s, alpha, gamma_s)
#> -102.2389 [cm]
